general.gigTitle: build, design, redesign, develop, clone ecommerce, wordpress website development

sellerCard.description: Welcome to my profile! I’m a CMS developer on Fiverr who has extensive experience in creating user-friendly and visually appealing custom, responsive, modern, unique, and professional websites that boost your business and online presence. Also, I know the other technologies commonly used in websites, For Instance, PHP, JavaScript, Bootstrap, HTML5, and CSS3. I genuinely desire to help those I work with and want them to be happy with their results.

description.content:
Looking for a modern & professional WordPress website Design, Redesign, or Woocommerce customization WordPress Site.


I will design, and redesign an eye-catching WordPress site or Figma, PSD to WordPress site with Elementor Pro. Woocommerce customization I will provide the Elementor Pro license key for a lifetime.


I offer WordPress expertise, cost-effective solutions, and excellent customer services at an affordable cost.


Check my recent work here >>>> www.fiverr.com/users/devkhodabox/portfolio


Services I Offer


  • Professional WordPress Website
  • Pixel Perfect by Elementor Pro
  • Redesign Existing Website for Better Looks
  • Fully Responsive (Mobile+Tablet+Desktop) Design
  • Attractive Layout With Color Combination
  • Woocommerce customization
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Setup Any Payment Gateway
  • Site Transfer to Another Domain or Hosting
  • Customized Unique Design Based on Your Business


Why hire me


  1. Instructional video on how you can edit your site
  2. Quick and Professional
  3. Fast Understanding Skills
  4. I assure you I will do your work until


Be smart and make smart decisions! Why wait in a busy seller's order queue? Place an order today and enjoy premium services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to start working?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Your hosting or WordPress login details with the website content

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will al pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, All pages are super responsive, mobile-friendly, and support all devices and browsers

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain and hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, you have to provide me with a good domain with cPanel Hosting. However I can suggest some good hosting providers if you want.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is included in the service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: 1) Free website installation ( create database, WordPress site installation) 2) setting Up the website using Elementor with the content and logo provided.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide support after completing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will provide 30 days of free support after completing the order.

packageList.title: SINGLE WEB PAGE (LANDING PAGE)

packageList.title: BUSINESS WEBSITE
packageList.description: DESIGN UPTO 7 PAGES ✅Blog ✅Complete E-commerce Website ✅Speed Optimization ✅One Page SEO ✅Responsive

packageList.title: PREMIUM WEBSITE (RECOMMENDED)
packageList.description: DESIGN UP TO 10 PAGES ✅Complete WooCommerce ✅Functionalities ✅Responsive ✅SEO Optimization

reviews.comment:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 7 Stars!

This is my third time getting a website from Khodabox, and once again, they’ve absolutely nailed it! This time, it was an eCommerce site, and I’m beyond impressed. Every single time, they exceed my expectations and deliver something even better than before.  

Khodabox is the only team I trust for my stores and websites. Their speed is unbelievable, their work is top-notch, and their customer service is simply amazing. I ran into an issue (which was my fault), and with just one message, they fixed it within an hour, that’s real dedication!   

If you're looking for a reliable, fast, and incredibly talented team, look no further. Khodabox, you’re destined for greatness here on Fiverr! Keep shining and growing! 

Good luck!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your amazing review and continued trust!  We're thrilled to exceed your expectations again. Your support means everything, and we look forward to more great projects together. Wishing you huge success!

reviews.comment:
Absolutely blown away by the website you created! The design is spot-on exactly what I envisioned, and the quality is truly TOP-NOTCH. The functionality is smooth, everything works flawlessly, and you even delivered ahead of schedule! Your professionalism and responsiveness made the entire process a breeze.   

I’ll definitely be coming back for more projects in the future. Highly recommend Khodabox to anyone looking for outstanding work!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your review, customer satisfaction is truly important to me and I am glad you noticed it.

reviews.comment: I had a great experience working with Khodabox! He updated my website's landing page with fresh images and a modern design, replacing the old content exactly as I wanted. The process was smooth, and the results exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend Khodabox for reliable and skilled work!

seller_response.comment: Thank you! It was a pleasure working with you. Your clear instructions contributed greatly to the success of the project. I’m looking forward to future collaborations!

reviews.comment: Khodabox is a hard-working individual and is willing to go the extra mile to make sure things are done. We're highly satisfied with their work and look forward to continuing our collaboration with Khodabox!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: Working with Khoda B was a seamless experience! The website development project was BUG FREE and exceeded expectations with incredible ATTENTION TO DETAILS. patience, professionalism. Definitely recommended.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.
